nutrient deficiencies: multiple vitamin and mineral 
supplements 
The groups most vulnerable to micronutrient deficiencies are pregnant and lactating women and 
young children, mainly because they have a relatively greater need for vitamins and minerals 
and are more susceptible to the harmful consequences of deficiencies. For a pregnant woman 
these include a greater risk of dying during childbirth, or of giving birth to an underweight or
